name: Parallèle
description:
Delve into a dungeon as an inquisitive knight as she reaches the first goal of her quest. Fight a handful of enemies, solve a puzzle and uncover mysteries to learn the poetic premise of this short adventure.

Controls:

  • Movement: Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Attack: Z
  • Interact: X
  • Peek: Shift + Arrow Keys

Developed with Unity 2020.1 between August 10th and August 16th of 2020 for the LOWREZJAM 2020. Sprites drawn and animated with Aseprite. Sound Effects from the Universal Sound FX package. Music from the Ultimate Game Music Collection.

Special thanks to my friends Eduardo Rizzo, Renato Cherullo and Thiago Magalhães for their ideas and support.
